title: Samsung's latest batteries make unusual wearables possible
text:
Samsung's latest batteries make unusual wearables possible 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Samsung's latest battery prototypes could lead not only to more powerful wearables, but also to unusual ones. The first model called Band is...
